title: New appointments for Education Ministry
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); New officers have been appointed to 16 posts of Director and Commissioner of Education at the Ministry of Education.

The Ministry of Education announced that with the approval of the Education Committee of the Public Service Commission, new officers have been appointed to fill the 16 vacant posts of Director and Commissioner of Education in the Ministry of Education and its affiliated institutions.
The relevant letters for these new appointments were handed over at the Ministry on Monday (25).
